name: xbackbone
description: XBackBone is a self-hosted file hosting and sharing platform with short links, drag-and-drop uploads, multi-user support, and integrations with share clients and screenshot tools.
features: Drag-and-drop uploads: Upload files directly from your browser with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for quick sharing.
Short link generation: Automatically create shortened URLs for uploaded files to simplify sharing and tracking.
Multi-user support: Manage multiple user accounts with individual storage quotas and permission controls.
Screenshot tool integration: Connect with ShareX, Flameshot, and other screenshot utilities for instant uploads.
Custom upload clients: Use built-in API support to integrate with third-party upload clients and automation tools.
Storage management: Monitor disk usage, set file retention policies, and manage uploaded content through an admin dashboard.
Public and private sharing: Control file visibility with public links or password-protected private shares.
Media preview: View images, videos, and documents directly in the browser without downloading.
Upload history: Track all uploads with timestamps, file sizes, and access statistics for each user.
API access: Programmatically upload and manage files using a RESTful API for automation workflows.
Theme customization: Personalize the interface with custom themes and branding options.
LDAP authentication: Integrate with existing directory services for centralized user management.
